channel.title: Footprinting and Enumeration Notes on Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Footprinting and Enumeration Notes on Personal Blog

item.title: Miscellaneous
item.description: Miscellaneous Options for i in {1..255}; do (ping -c 1 192.168.1.${i} | grep "bytes from" &); done - Scan for hosts in subnet nc -w 1 192.168.110.52 1-10000 -v -z -n 2>&1 | grep succeeded - Scan host range of ports using nc for i in {1..65535}; do (echo > /dev/tcp/192.168.1.1/$i) >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo $i is open; done - Scan host range of ports gobuster dir -u https://10.10.10.7/ -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/raft-medium-directories-lowercase.

item.title: Nmap
item.description: Nmap Options Nmap Options 10.10.10.0/24 - Target network range. -sn - Disables port scanning. -Pn - Disables ICMP Echo Requests -n - Disables DNS Resolution. -PE - Performs the ping scan by using ICMP Echo Requests against the target. --packet-trace - Shows all packets sent and received. --reason - Displays the reason for a specific result. --disable-arp-ping - Disables ARP Ping Requests. --top-ports=<num> - Scans the specified top ports that have been defined as most frequent.
